paper_abstract: We study the mixing properties of permutations obtained as a product of two uniformly random permutations of fixed cycle types. For instance, we give an exact formula for the probability that elements 1,2,..., k are in distinct cycles of the random permutation of {1,2,..., n} obtained as a product of two uniformly random n-cycles.
paper_title: Separation Probabilities for Products of Permutations
